text: (Aey Nabi), tum jis haal mein bhi hotey ho aur Quran mein se kuch bhi sunate ho, aur logon, tum bhi jo kuch karte ho us sab ke dauran mein hum tumko dekhte rehte hain. Koi zarra barabar cheez aasman aur zameen mein aisi nahin hai, na choti na badi, jo tere Rubb ki nazar se posheeda (chupi) ho aur ek saaf daftar mein darj na ho
